nodes.text: Bogg 9 was a moon of Bogden. It was covered in rocks and dirt. Once per orbit, it passed close enough to Bogg 2 to share atmosphere. Counterfeiters sent fake Republic credits from Bogg 2 to Bogg 9 via balloons, then claimed the counterfeit credits were stolen, receiving real credits in recompense. Also, it was popular among pirates to raid the balloons as they passed by.
